mapper.insert: insert into t_order ( order_id, user_id, sup_id, order_status, order_time, order_amount, order_amount_init, express_type, addr_prov, addr_city, addr_dist, addr_town, addr_detail, addr_all, addr_name, addr_zip, addr_phone, addr_tel, invoice_type, invoice_flag, invoice_content, invoice_company, invoice_num, decide_reason, addr_email, sup_order_id, companyid, vat_receive_name, vat_receive_tel, vat_receive_detail, vat_receive_prov, vat_receive_city, vat_receive_dist, buy_type ) values ( #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sysdate, #{orderAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{orderAmountInit,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{expressType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{addrProv,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{addrCity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{addrDist,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{addrTown,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{addrDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addrAll,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addrName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addrZip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addrPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addrTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{invoiceType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{invoiceFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{invoiceContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{invoiceCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{invoiceNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{decideReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addrEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supOrderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vatReceiveName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vatReceiveTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vatReceiveDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vatReceiveProv,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{vatReceiveCity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{vatReceiveDist,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{buyType,jdbcType=INTEGER} )

insert into t_order_snapshot ( order_id, sup_id, sup_goods_id, goods_name, image_path, goods_price, goods_price_init, buy_num, refund_status, exchange_status, goods_model, quote_id )
select #{item.orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.supId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.supGoodsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.imagePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.goodsPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{item.goodsPriceInit,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{item.buyNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, 0, 0, #{item.goodsModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.quoteId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} from dual
insert into t_image_info ( id, business_id, business_type, url ) values ( to_char(sysdate, 'yyyyMMddHH24miss') || lpad(IMAGE_INDEX.nextval, 6, '0'), #{orderId}, 0, #{img,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: select nvl(sum(order_amount),0) from t_order where order_status = 14 or order_status = 20
select a.*, b.sup_type from t_order_snapshot a, t_sup_info b where a.sup_id = b.sup_id and order_id = #{orderId}
select sum(buy_num) from t_order_snapshot where order_id = #{orderId}
select companyname from users where userid = #{userId}
select contact_num from users where userid = #{userId}
select url from t_image_info where business_id = #{orderId} and business_type = 0

SELECT T2.SUP_ORDER_ID, T2.ORDER_ID, T2.SUP_ID, T2.ORDER_STATUS, T1.EXCHANGE_AMOUNT, T1.EXCHANGE_ID FROM T_ORDER_EXCHANGE T1 LEFT JOIN T_ORDER T2 ON T1.ORDER_ID = T2.ORDER_ID WHERE T1.EXCHANGE_STATUS IN ('0','1') AND t2.order_status != '20' AND T1.SUP_ID = #{supId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT T2.SUP_ORDER_ID, T2.ORDER_ID, T2.SUP_ID, T2.ORDER_STATUS, T1.REFOUND_AMOUNT, T1.REFOUND_ID FROM T_ORDER_REFOUND T1 LEFT JOIN T_ORDER T2 ON T1.ORDER_ID = T2.ORDER_ID WHERE T1.REFOUND_STATUS IN ('0','1') AND t2.order_status != '20' AND T1.SUP_ID = #{supId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
